pages.title: Proper Wands
pages.text: This is the real magic, am I right $(playername)?$(br2)Craft your wands, charge them with turtles blessings and take over the world! (in a nice way). $(br2)Here, let me show you how to get each wand.
The most basic $(turtlemancer) wand. Not capable of much, but it's a start.
The common $(turtlemancer) wand. I have spent half my life using one like this. Good looking and powerful wand. A must have!

pages.title: Advanced Wand
pages.text: The most powerfull $(turtlemancer) wand. As powerful as it looks. However, it's not cheap.$(br2)To obtain this wand you have to perform $(l:rituals/common_rituals#ritual_good_wand)this ritual$().
